group_1.textRight: Whew... Seems like you're really good at@your job.
You're not the kind of guys I'd want to@make enemies out of.

group_1.textLeft: Well, thanks for the compliment.
You know, if you've got any requests,@we could discuss them right now?

group_1.textRight: Well, ain't that a shame.
We've got no use for people who'll only defend.
...That said, if there's any chance you're going@to accept requests from the Union...
You'll still be a hindrance to us...

group_1.textLeft: We'll only be taking on Witch hunts and@protective escorts.
We have no intention of getting involved in@the battle for the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones.
I don't think that would interfere with your@activities, would it?

group_1.textRight: ...Got any proof to back that up?

group_1.textLeft: ...None.
But we intend to prove it through our actions@from here on.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, then, I guess we'll just have to@wait and see.
Come on, guys. Let's go.

group_1.textLeft: Are we just gonna leave them be...?!

group_1.textRight: If they're lying about being neutral,@we'll face them again sooner or later.
We'll deal with them then.

group_1.textLeft: But...that Magical Girl pretended to be@one of us...!

group_1.textRight: That is not true...!
Yeah... I'll tell you the details later.@I think there's been a misunderstanding.

group_1.textLeft: Misunderstanding...?

group_1.textRight: Oops, the Eldest Sister called for us.@C'mon, don't stop and smell the flowers, let's go.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, understood...!
...Phew...they have withdrawn...!

group_1.textRight: Nayuta, are ya hurt anywhere?!

group_1.textLeft: No, all is well...!
You really are quite strong, Ayame.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heehee, aren't I?!

group_1.textLeft: I wonder whether that went well...
We've made it clear that we're neutral@bodyguards, haven't we...?

group_1.textRight: Well, I guess it'll depend on what we do@from now on.
But at least for now, they've decided to@wait and see.
I don't think they'll mess with us for@the time being.

group_1.textLeft: ...Even though it's the exact opposite of@what we've done until now...
This will make them recognize our neutrality...@...Won't it...?

group_1.textRight: Just be happy about it, Konoha.

group_1.textLeft: ...All right.

group_1.textRight: How was it? Were you able to meet the person@you came for?

group_1.textLeft: He is not at the hospital today, so I did not@get a chance to see him.
But I was able to make an appointment for@another day, so I achieved my goal.

group_1.textRight: Congrats, Nayuta!!

group_1.textLeft: It is thanks to you and the others that I was@able to make the appointment today.
Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: No problem!
Is the person you wanted to see today the one@you're lookin' for?

group_1.textLeft: No, today I came to see my uncle.@The one I am looking for is my father..

group_1.textRight: Your dad...

group_1.textLeft: My father had been researching and compiling@information pertaining to Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, so he was a scholar?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
I just want to find my father as soon as possible.@He disappeared without telling me anything...

group_1.textRight: Looking for your dad...he must be@pretty important to you.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, he is. Would you not regard your@own father as important to you?

group_1.textRight: Nope, I was abandoned, so I don't even know@what mine looks like.

group_1.textLeft: What...?!
F-forgive me...I was very...inconsiderate@just now...

group_1.textRight: S'okay, I'm totally fine with it!
I've always had Konoha and Hazuki by my side!

group_1.textLeft: So that is your situation...
Then I'm sure you'd be able to understand.
How would you feel if your beloved sisters@left you without saying a word?

group_1.textRight: Hmm... I'd be lonely, and worried...@[chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_200][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]And I'd wanna know why they left!

group_1.textLeft: The same goes for me.

group_1.textRight: Ohhh, gotcha!
Then we gotta find your dad quickly!

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textRight: There's a Witch near the hospital...!

group_1.textLeft: I cannot overlook this...!@I will go after it!

group_1.textRight: Oh, wait up, Nayuta!@We'll be there too, of course.
We were requested to guard you, after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay! I am counting on you!
